author: Brodigan
description:
Jim Acosta sat down with…AI? The former White House correspondent interviewed a computer-generated victim of a school shooting. Illinois Congresswoman Delia Ramirez, who serves in the United States government, says she’s going to put Guatemala first. A DHS notice has been released that says FEMA relief could be denied to states that boycott Israeli companies. President Donald Trump has been trying to get a deal with India and we keep hearing about how great an ally India is. But, is it, really?

JIM ACOSTA INTERVIEWS A.I.
title: 🔴 Watch! Is America First Dead?

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

There are few things lazier than calling country artists racist or the opinions of woke white women. Unless, of course, you get an AWFL singer dropping lyrics calling a country singer raaaaaaacist. In that case, you have Paramore leader singer Hayley Williams. She lashed out at a country singer she claims is raaaaaacist, and the streets say she means Morgan Wallen.

I'll cop to being a Paramore fan up to and including "Ain't It Fun," but in the years since Williams has been trying to reinvent herself as being, like, totally into vital social issues and stuff. She has told fans that
title: Woke rocker lashes out at "racist country star" in the new song, and the streets say she's talking about Morgan Wallen

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

I know that you know that Democrats hate America. They get elected to office hating the country they have been elected to office to. In related news, rain is wet, beer is delicious, and Sydney Sweeney has a sweet pair of... jeans. Every so often, you get an example that is a little too on the nose, like a congresswoman declaring her allegiance to a foreign country over our country while speaking a foreign language in another foreign country.

title: Democrat congresswoman pledges her allegiance to a foreign country over America while speaking to anti-American org
